definition: to cast/to send/to throw oneself (into the river etc)/to seek refuge/to place oneself into the hands of

sentences.english: Lotus reincarnation reaches poor Home He, name element daughter.
sentences.chinese: 荷花投胎至貧苦的何家，取名素女。

sentences.english: That is exactly what my view of death is without any reincarnation.
sentences.chinese: 依我看來，死了就是死了，並沒有什麼投胎轉世。

sentences.english: The class will be reincarnated yellow bransh boy, black teach is becoming youth.
sentences.chinese: 黃教的班祥會投胎成爲靈童，黑教則轉世爲天童。

sentences.english: Angel has crowd of lines to have to go to the metempsychosis the soul.
sentences.chinese: 天使帶著一羣排隊要去投胎的靈魂。

sentences.english: I believe I will be reincarnated as a snake.
sentences.chinese: 我相信我死後會投胎成蛇。

sentences.english: So she got into the cycle of reincarnation to Lin's family Meizhou.
sentences.chinese: 於是龍女便下凡投胎在湄洲林家。

sentences.english: You knew this when you agreed to incarnating on Mother Earth.
sentences.chinese: 你們在同意投胎到地球母親就已經明白此點。

sentences.english: There's nothing wrong with you that reincarnation won't cure.
sentences.chinese: 你什麼毛病也沒有，就算投胎轉世也沒得救的。

sentences.english: Once you die you are reborn.
sentences.chinese: 一個人死後就會重新投胎回到人間。

sentences.english: Earlier incarnations were largely untainted by the confusion brought by later incarnations of those most against the vision of Christ Michael.
sentences.chinese: 早先的投胎基本上沒有被後來的反叛者的混淆污染。

sentences.english: Can say, married to the woman is a second birth.
sentences.chinese: 可以這樣說，結婚對女人就是第二次投胎。

definition: reborn (of departed spirit)/to be reincarnated/to leave home for a new life
to play tricks/to cheat/to get up to mischief/to become a ghost/to give up the ghost
to surpass/to transcend/to perform religious ceremonies to help the soul find peace
same as 閻羅王|阎罗王/Yama, King of Hell/translation of Sanskrit: Yama Raja
lit. to ascend to heaven/to die
to accumulate merit/to do good/to give to charity/virtuous actions
